org.spongepowered.api.event.message

Interface MessageEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Event
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AdvancementEvent.Grant, ClientConnectionEvent.Auth, ClientConnectionEvent.Disconnect, ClientConnectionEvent.Join, ClientConnectionEvent.Login, DestructEntityEvent, DestructEntityEvent.Death, KickPlayerEvent, MessageChannelEvent, MessageChannelEvent.Chat
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessageEvent

    public interface MessageEvent
extends Event
    Describes events when a involving a Text message.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MessageEvent.DefaultBodyApplier
      Represents the initial body set by the implementation before the event is posted.
      static class  MessageEvent.DefaultHeaderApplier
      Represents the initial header set by the implementation before the event is posted.
      static class  MessageEvent.MessageFormatter
      Formatter used for formatting messages within this event.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String PARAM_MESSAGE_BODY
      Parameter for body section in body partition.
      static String PARAM_MESSAGE_FOOTER
      Parameter for footer section in footer partition.
      static String PARAM_MESSAGE_HEADER
      Parameter for header section in header partition.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default MessageEvent.MessageFormatter clearMessage()
      Clears the currently set message and returns the empty formatter.
      MessageEvent.MessageFormatter getFormatter()
      Returns the MessageEvent.MessageFormatter used to mutate the event's message.
      default Text getMessage()
      Returns the formatted message.
      Text getOriginalMessage()
      Gets the original Text message.
      boolean isMessageCancelled()
      Returns true if the Text returned by getMessage() should not be sent.
      default void setMessage(TextRepresentable body)
      Clears any existing components and sets the body.
      default void setMessage(TextRepresentable header, TextRepresentable body)
      Clears any existing components and sets the header and body respectively.
      default void setMessage(TextRepresentable header, TextRepresentable body, TextRepresentable footer)
      Clears any existing components and sets the header, body, and footer respectively.
      void setMessageCancelled(boolean cancelled)
      Sets whether the Text returned by getMessage() should be sent.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.Event

        getCause, getContext, getSource
